exercise-tasks.description: Create a CTE that calculates total population per region
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
WITH RegionTotals AS (
  SELECT Name,
    Region,
    Population,
    SUM(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region) AS RegionTotal
  FROM Countries
)

SELECT * FROM RegionTotals
exercise-tasks.verify-query: WITH RegionTotals AS (SELECT Name, Region, Population, SUM(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region) AS RegionTotal FROM Countries) SELECT * FROM RegionTotals

exercise-tasks.description: Using the CTE, rank countries within each region by population
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
WITH RegionTotals AS (
  SELECT Name,
    Region,
    Population,
    SUM(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region) AS RegionTotal
  FROM Countries)

SELECT Name,
  Region,
  Population,
  RegionTotal, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population DESC) AS RegionRank
FROM RegionTotals
exercise-tasks.verify-query: WITH RegionTotals AS (SELECT Name, Region, Population, SUM(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region) AS RegionTotal FROM Countries) SELECT Name, Region, Population, RegionTotal, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population DESC) AS RegionRank FROM RegionTotals

exercise-tasks.description: Calculate running totals and previous country population per region in a single query
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Name,
  Region,
  Population,
  SUM(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population) AS RunningTotal,
  LAG(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population) AS PrevPop
FROM Countries
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Name, Region, Population, SUM(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population) AS RunningTotal, LAG(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population) AS PrevPop FROM Countries

exercise-tasks.description: Combine a CTE with multiple window functions: running total, rank, and previous population for each region
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
WITH RegionMetrics AS (
  SELECT
    Name,
    Region,
    Population,
    SUM(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population) AS RunningTotal,
    LAG(Population) OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population) AS PrevPop
  FROM Countries
)

SELECT
  Name,
  Region,
  Population,
  RunningTotal,
  PrevPop,
  RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY Region ORDER BY Population DESC) AS RegionRank
FROM RegionMetrics
